page.description: The Update Indexes action updates the indexes for specified tables.

step.description: To the right of Update indexes for which tables select either:

case.description: "All tables in the Database". This will update the indexes for all tables EXCEPT the ones you select in the box.
"Selected tables". This will update ONLY the tables you select.

step.description: Check boxes to the left of selected tables.
Optionally modify the default comment which describes the action.
